N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.15 - Notification to ombudsmen of critical incidents

State Regulations
(a) The facility or program director shall
immediately notify the office of the ombudsman of any critical incident
involving a youth under his/her care. (b) For the purpose of this Part, a critical
incident shall mean: (1)
an incident which
indicates that a violation of rights has occurred that could lead to
disciplinary action and/or criminal prosecution; (2)
an incident in which a youth has died or
sustained substantial physical injury; or
(3)
an incident which could give rise to a
claim against a youth. Notes
